comment.author: 83114071@N00
comment._content: Who was William Christman? What is his significance to history besides volunteering to fight for the Pennsylvania Infantry during the American Civil War?

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: Hi JLS Media, William Christman was the first military burial at Arlington National Cemetery. You can read more information in the Archivist's latest blog post: blogs.archives.gov/aotus/?p=2114 Thanks for your interest! Meredith (admin) U.S. National Archives
